promptTemplate: Ultra-realistic documentary shot: The back of a human hand gently opens the rustic wooden {container_type} door toward the camera. Inside, {animal_count} extremely lifelike miniature {animal_type} are nestled in a compact straw nest. The animals {animal_action}. Setting: {environment} with late morning sunlight, casting soft natural shadows. The {container_type} is mounted on a fence pole. Camera: ARRI Alexa Mini LF with 35mm prime macro lens, locked-off frontal shot at door level, f/2.8, perfectly centered composition. Ultra-realistic with hyperrealism, advanced fur/scale simulation, subsurface skin scattering, micro eye reflections. Ambient sounds include soft nature sounds, subtle wood creak, and tiny creature sounds. Mood: surprising, calm, and softly joyful.
